a11y.priceAmountShoppingCart: {{item}} items. Total price for this item: ¥{{price}}.
a11y.qrCode: Scan the QR Code by holding up your phone to the top-left of the screen. Make sure screen curtain is turned off.

loginCta.title: Log in to unlock more features!
loginCta.message: Log in to use Pay Later, view your order history, and earn points! Currently only available to BAID students and faculty.

updateCta.title: What's New
updateCta.point1: Welcome back! Whale Cafe has been upgraded for the new semester.
updateCta.point2: Whale Cafe now comes with a better, more user-friendly experience.
updateCta.point3: We now support Weixin Pay! You no longer have to wait for your payment to be confirmed.
updateCta.point4: You can still pay with cash, coupons, or Pay Later.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.loginNag: You can pay with Balance and Pay Later after you <1>log in</1>.
checkout.onSiteNag: You can pay with cash by ordering on-site.
checkout.couponTooBig: Coupon value (¥{{original}}) exceeds total price. The remaining value will be lost.

wechatPay.title: Weixin Pay
wechatPay.scan: Please use WeChat to scan the QR code below.
wechatPay.processing: Please wait while we are processing your payment.
wechatPay.error: An error occurred while trying to begin the payment process. Please try again.
